amendment.description: Amendment sought to strike lines 4 through 19 on page 67 related to the rule entitled "Stream Protection Rule" signed by the Assistant Secretary for Land and Minerals Management of the Department of the Interior.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 10 printed in House Report 114-683 to strike lines 4 through 19 on page 67.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Beyer amendment (A009) Failed by recorded vote: 190 - 235 (Roll no. 421).

action.text: Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
Roll call votes on amendments in House
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Beyer amendment (A009) Failed by recorded vote: 190 - 235 (Roll no. 421).
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A009) offered by Mr. Beyer.
